title: School Idol Squadron, One Member Joins!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Shizuku-chan, Shizuku-chan, do you wanna join the School Idol Squadron?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>School Idol Squadron......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Setsuna-chan, Maki-chan, and Rin-chan are part of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>If I join, do I become a superhero?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It would be the first step in becoming one, nya! We’re practicing our entrance lines in the park right now. Mine is, “Rushing like the wind! I’m Rin, the Yellow Cat!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Entrance line practice......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>We’re supposed to shout our introduction from the top of the slide, slide down, and strike an awesome pose! But Rin is still working on that part. Maki-chan gets embarrassed when there are other people at the park, and Rin hasn’t decided on a good pose yet...... Rin doesn’t really know how it feels to become a superhero.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>How it feels to become a superhero......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Shizuku-chan, you perform in plays, so you probably have a better sense of how to do that, right? Would you like to try with us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Rin-san! I’ll try it. I want to understand that feeling!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Really!? Hooray~! Then, let’s go tell Setsuna-san and come up with an entrance line~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Umm, I’ve already come up with one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ooh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Roaring like thunder! Blue Hurricane Shizuku is here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
